name: Ridgid 31642 model 152 Quick-Acting Tubing Cutter, 1/4" to 2-5/8" Tube Cutter
short_description: Not_applicable
Made in USA
X-cel knob for cutting tubing more quickly and easily with a larger, more ergonomic design
Quick-acting design, I-beam construction and hardened wear surfaces for superior durability. Thrust-bearing slide assemblies for smooth operation
Features a convenient fold-away reamer to clean and insure a better connection
X-cel wheel Pin with ball detent designs Allows you to change the cutter wheel quickly with no tool needed and no lost clips
Tubing cutter has a 1/4-inch to 2-5/8-Inch (6 mm to 66 mm) cutting capacity
product_description: 632-31642 features: -models 151 and 152 Features fold-away Reamers. -Bigger, ergonomic knob provides a firmer grip to cut through tubing More quickly. -Unique, ball-detent wheel Pin allows the wheel to be quickly changed without tools. -Cutting Direction: straight. Cutters: -tubing cutters. Multi-use: -Yes. Quantity: -single. Dimensions: overall product weight: -1.81 pounds.

name: Inside Pipe Cutter for PVC Pipe Cutter, Stainless Steel Plumbing Inside Cutter Tools with Diamond Grit Cutting Wheel and Handle, 7" Adjustable Cutting Depth for 1-1/2"- 8" PVC Pipe (1Pcs)
short_description: Set Content: This set includes 1 × guide bar (11 inches), 1 × holder, 1 × cutting blade and 2 × wrenches or 2 × guide bar (11 inches), 2 × holder, 2 × cutting blade and 4 × wrenches. The complete set of accessories can not only be applied to a variety of PVC pipes to meet a variety of cutting needs, but also to achieve a smooth and precise cut

Application: This PVC inside pipe cutting tool is suitable for PVC pipes from 1-1/2 inches to 8 inches. The diamond grinding wheels can also be used to cut or polish harder textures like glass, marble, jade, crystal, stone, and wood

7 Inch Cutting Depth: This PVC inner pipe cutting tool is suitable for cutting pipes up to 7 inches deep. It features a removable guide disk and a retaining ring that allows for easy adjustment of the cutting depth (0-7 inches) by adjusting the position of the retaining ring, markings help to control the depth of cut
Sturdy Texture: This PVC inner pipe cutting tool is crafted from stainless steel, which is sturdy and enduring to meet the needs of use

Easy to Use: This inside pipe cutting tool requires only a fixed blade and comes with a 1/4in hex handle. With its intuitive design and precise engineering, it makes it easy to achieve precise and smooth cuts from the inside of the pipe

name: Ridgid - 41608 RIDGID PTEC 30000 Tubular Tailpiece Extension Cutter, 1-1/4", Red
short_description: Executes clean, fast and straight cuts on polyethylene (PE), polypropylene (PP), and thin-wall PVC tubes
This cutter automatically deburrs in parallel to the cutting action so there's no need for a second tool to deburr
Automatic beveling allows for immediate, easy joining to other sink drain pieces
The open bore design allows cutting of double-flanged plastic drain pipe
Tubing cutter has a 1-1/4-inch single-flanged or 1-1/2-inch double-flanged outer diameter capacity
product_description: RIDGID 41608 Model PTEC 3000 Plastic Drain Pipe Cutter, 1-1/4-inch and 1-1/2-inch Tubing Cutter

name: Ridgid 57008 C-Style Close Quarters Copper Tubing Cutter
short_description: Cut 1⁄2" and 3⁄4" tubing with one cutter with quick change feature
Snap-On Feature For A Quick Pipe Connection/Ridgid’S X-Cel Wheel Pin For Quick Wheel Replacement. No Tools Required
Spring loaded cutter wheel provides a constant pressure on pipe
product_description: Cut 1⁄2" and 3⁄4" tubing with one Cutter with Quick Change feature. Snap-On feature for a Quick pipe connection. Spring loaded Cutter wheel provides a Constant pressure on pipe. Ridgid tools are backed by the best coverage in the industry. Join the community and talk with other pros today.

name: Klein Tools 50048 C-Style Copper Tubing Cutter Set with 1/2, 3/4, and 1-Inch Cutters, MODbox Case, Ultra-Compact for Tight Spaces, 3-Piece
short_description: COPPER TUBING CUTTER: Cuts 1/2-Inch, 3/4-Inch, and 1-Inch (12 mm, 19 mm, and 25 mm) copper tubing
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Grooves on the outside for secure handling
DURABLE BLADE: Blade made of high carbon steel for long-lasting cutting performance
PREVENTS WATER BUILD UP: Water drainage ports keep water from accumulating inside the tool
OPTIMIZED FOR TIGHT SPACES: Designed for use in ultra-compact work areas
SMOOTH CUTTING CAPABILITY: Free-spinning rollers and spring-action blade allow for clean, precise cuts
MODbox COMPATIBLE CASE: Attaches to MODbox toolboxes and the MODbox Case Adapter Side Rail Attachment (Cat. No. 54875MB)
product_description: The Klein Tools C-Style Copper Tubing Cutter Set includes three tubing cutters in a MODbox compatible case, Cutters are designed to work in ultra-compact spaces and cut 1/2-Inch, 3/4-Inch, and 1-Inch (12, 19, and 25 mm) copper tubing. Grooves on the exterior allow for improved grip and secure handling, with water drainage ports to help keep water from being stored inside. Free-spinning rollers and a spring-action blade help with smooth, precise cuts while maintaining force throughout the cut. name: Ridgid - CC247 RIDGID 40617 Model 101 Close Quarters Tubing Cutter, 1/4-inch to 1-1/8-inch Tube Cutter Silver
short_description: CLOSE QUARTERS TUBING CUTTER: Specially designed for use in tight spaces and on small diameter metal surfaces, a must-have in any plumber's tool kit
WORKS WITH VARIOUS METALS: Features 1/4" to 1-1/8" cutting capacity and is suitable for use with hard and soft copper, aluminum, brass, and plastic, offering more versatility
KNURLED FEED SCREW KNOB: Gives easy control of cutting pressure for clean cuts, offering convenient use
STURDY DESIGN: Includes a strong yet lightweight slide and wheel housing for long-lasting durability, the cutter is made from durable and high-grade steel
SPARE CUTTER WHEEL: Helps you get more out of this tool and ensures maximum uptime, so you're always prepared with the tools you need
product_description: A Midget Cutter with extra wheel. Pliers and cutters made for restricted spaces with small diameter, aluminum, plastic tubing, Brass, hard and soft copper. Strong, lightweight slide and wheel housing. Hand tools with big knurled feed screw knob Screw knobs provide Quick control of cutting pressure for clean trims. Model 117 and 118 have all of the features on the no. 101. Self-feeding Cutter wheel that instantly slices once the knob is tightened. Model 117 has a special knob for faster clenching of the feedscrew. Available with one wheel. With STD. Wheel E-3469. Weighs 1/2 lbs. Cutting capacity of 1/4 in. (Min), 1/8 in. (Max).

name: DURATECH Tubing Cutter 1/8"-1-1/4", Copper, Aluminum, Brass and Plastic Tubing Quick-Acting Cutter, With Replacement Wheel and Reamer
short_description: This powerful tube cutter is specially designed for quick cutting of copper, brass, aluminum, plastic, or other thin tubes. In addition, fold-away reamer stored in frame allows for easier removal of burrs

The cutting wheel is crafted from premium steel material, ensuring smooth and accurate cuts, thereby improving cutting efficiency and saving time and effort. High-density ball bearing rollers provide a secure grip on the pipe during the tube cutting process, preventing uneven cutting surfaces caused by unstable clamping

Tubing cutter has a screw feed with a large grip knob to make it easier to tighten the cutter, allowing for quick adjustment and providing strong clamping force to ensure cutting stability. Pry open the bottom knob to get out the spare cutting wheel

Only need to rotate the knob to grip the tube, revolve copper tubing cutter around the tube(taking care not to move the cutter as this could result in an uneven cut or damaged pipe), tighten grip smoothly after each full circle until full cut

Our copper tube cutter can easily and efficiently cut through 1/8 "-1-1/4 " outer diameter, suitable for electrical, air conditioning installation, automotive and other plumbing installation and maintenance

name: Mutt Tools Professional 2-1/2 Inch PVC Pipe Cutter Tool - Heavy-Duty Ratcheting Pipe Cutter for PVC, CPVC, PEX, ABS Plastic Pipes - Cuts Up to 2.5 Inch Outer Diameter - Plumbing Cutting Tool
short_description: Versatile Cutting Capability: Easily cuts through PVC pipe, CPVC, PEX, ABS, and plastic pipes up to 2.5 inch diameter; perfect for plumbing projects, irrigation systems, and home repairs; designed for clean, straight cuts on most plastic pipes.

Professional Grade Design: Heavy-duty ratcheting pvc pipe cutter mechanism requires minimal effort; comfortable ergonomic grip reduces hand fatigue; durable construction ensures this pvc cutter tool lasts through countless projects

Easy Operation: Ratcheting pipe cutter design allows for one-handed operation; perfect for working in tight spaces; adjustable blade accommodates various pipe sizes from small tubing to 2 inch pvc pipe and 2.5 inch pvc pipe

Time-Saving Solution: Cuts faster and cleaner than traditional pipe cutting tools; streamlines pipe cutting, reducing the need for extra setup; ideal pipe cutter for professional plumbers, contractors, DIY enthusiasts; works with garden hoses and also effective on plastic hoses and non-metal conduit.

Complete Package: Includes premium quality pipe cutting tool; compact and portable design; perfect alternative to electric pipe cutters; offers professional-grade performance in a compact, cost-effective design.

name: Inside Pipe Cutter for PVC Pipe Cutter Tool with 4" Scale Adjustable Depth Gauge Guide, 5pcs Saw Tooth Blades with 0.315 Hex Key Shaft, Plumbing Internal Plastic Pipe Cutter Set
short_description: Designed For Tight Space: Suffering from dealing with the old pipes below floor? This PVC pipe inside cutter is the answer by cutting flush from inside the pipe instead of opening floor to saw off the pipe. Moreover, this pipe cutter kit features 5 blades(22 mm,25 mm,32 mm, 35 mm,44 mm) and 3.9’’ large guide disk to fit a wide range of pipes,economical and convenient

Adjustable Cutting Depth: Fixed onto a lengthened shaft by two set screws, the guide disk allows you to adjust the cutting depth within 4 in. Built-in bearing also helps keep the guide disk in correct position for the rotating shaft. Make the cutting process run smoothly and precisely

Selected Material: Crafted from hardened stainless steel shaft and HHS saw blades, this pipe cutter is sharp, sturdy, and durable enough to withstand repeated usage. This pipe cutter excels at cutting through pipes in PVC and soft metal material like butter. An excellent choice for both professionals and amateurs

Easy To Use: Install the desired blade on the shaft securely. Then place the cutter into the 3/8’’ drill chuck and tighten it. Hold the drill straight against the pipe and start drilling at a low speed. Please slowly work your way around clockwise until cutting through the whole pipe. Warm tips: Engraved side of the blade should face upwards to make the arrow consistent with the drill running clockwise

Wide Application: Designed to reach tight space where regular tools can’t reach, this PVC pipe inside cutter offers you a game-changing experience while doing a shower drain, toilet flange, and removing pipes in sitting wall or concrete slab. What’s more, cutting from outside the pipe is also available

name: Klein Tools 50063 Ratcheting PVC Pipe Cutter, Cuts 1-1/4-Inch I.D. PVC, CPVC, PEX Pipes, One-Handed Operation, Replaceable Blades
short_description: RATCHETING PVC PIPE CUTTER: Ability to cut up to 1-1/4-Inch (31 mm) I.D.; 1-5/8-Inch (41 mm) O.D. pipes
VERSATILE CUTTING: Cuts schedule 40/80 PVC CPVC, and PEX
LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: Soft-molded handles provide comfort and secure grip
DURABLE RATCHETING BLADE: Handles pull apart to retract blade
SECURE STORAGE: Latch ensures safe closure for PVC cutter tool
ONE-HANDED OPERATION: Handle design allows for easy one-handed use
REPLACEMENT BLADES AVAILABLE: Ratcheting blades for increased tool life; sold separately (Cat. No. 50064)
product_description: The Klein Tools Ratcheting PVC Pipe Cutter has a cutting capacity of up to 1-1/4-Inch (31 mm) I.D. and is designed to cut schedule 40/80 PVC, CPVC, and PEX pipes. The lightweight, soft-molded handles ensure comfortable grip and offer increased leverage during use. Pulling the handles apart retracts the blade allowing for easy one-handed operation.
